participant_1.background:
I love the way my pets stare back at me.
i love to dance salsa.
I sometimes get too caught up in my own head and don't listen to my partner.
i sometimes scratch my nose for fun.
i love the band van halen.

participant_2.background:
I would be sad if I lost my eyesight.
I sometimes struggle to find clothes that fit my body type.
i do not like being asked a lot of questions.
i have 4 dogs.
i am 17.

content.text: Hello! How are you today?
Hello! I am good, thank you. How are you?
I am doing well, thank you. I love salsa dancing. Do you dance?
I have not tried it before, but I would love to learn. It looks like so much fun!
It is really fun! It is a great way to exercise and get to know new people.
I love meeting new people! I have four dogs, so I am always meeting new people at the park.
Oh wow! I love dogs! What are their names?
Their names are Buddy, Bailey, Charlie, and Cooper.
Those are great names! I love the name Cooper.
Thank you! It is a family name.
That is a nice tradition.
Yeah, it is. I am really close to my family.
I am close to my family too. I love spending time with them.
Me too! I love going to my parents' house for dinner on Sundays.
That sounds like a lot of fun! My parents live out of state, so I do not get to see them as often as I would like.
Oh, that is too bad. I am glad that you get to see them on Sundays.
Yeah, it is great. I am going to go visit them next month.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I am sure they will be happy to see you.
I am sure they will be too. I am excited to see them.
I am glad that you are excited.
Thank you! I am excited to hear about your salsa dancing adventures.
I will be sure to let you know how it goes
